item.title: Blacksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 3)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Author (Level 8)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 2)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Architect (Level 1)
item.description: Added a submodule to a repository.

item.title: Master Carpenter (Level 1)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Gardner (Level 4)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 3)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Collector (Level 4)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 3)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 1)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 2)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.
